014package org.jdbi.v3.guice.internal;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Type;
017import java.util.Map;
018import java.util.Set;
019
020import javax.inject.Singleton;
021
022import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
023import com.google.inject.Inject;
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.Jdbi;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.codec.Codec;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.codec.CodecFactory;
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapper;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.RowMapper;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
030import org.jdbi.v3.core.spi.JdbiPlugin;
031import org.jdbi.v3.guava.codec.TypeResolvingCodecFactory;
032import org.jdbi.v3.guice.GuiceJdbiCustomizer;
033
034import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
035
036/**
037 * Customizer contributing all customizations from a module to a Jdbi instance.
038 */
039@Singleton
040public class InternalGuiceJdbiCustomizer implements GuiceJdbiCustomizer {
041
042    private final Set<RowMapper<?>> rowMappers;
043    private final Map<Type, RowMapper<?>> qualifiedRowMappers;
044    private final Set<ColumnMapper<?>> columnMappers;
045    private final Map<QualifiedType<?>, ColumnMapper<?>> qualifiedColumnMappers;
046    private final Set<GuiceJdbiCustomizer> customizers;
047    private final Map<Class<?>, String> arrayTypes;
048    private final Set<JdbiPlugin> plugins;
049    private final CodecFactory codecFactory;
050
051    @Inject
052    InternalGuiceJdbiCustomizer(final Set<RowMapper<?>> rowMappers,
053        final Map<Type, RowMapper<?>> qualifiedRowMappers,
054        final Set<ColumnMapper<?>> columnMappers,
055        final Map<QualifiedType<?>, ColumnMapper<?>> qualifiedColumnMappers,
056        final Set<GuiceJdbiCustomizer> customizers,
057        final Map<Class<?>, String> arrayTypes,
058        final Set<JdbiPlugin> plugins,
059        final Map<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>> codecs) {
060        this.rowMappers = ImmutableSet.copyOf(checkNotNull(rowMappers, "rowMappers is null"));
061        this.qualifiedRowMappers = checkNotNull(qualifiedRowMappers, "qualifiedRowMappers is null");
062        this.columnMappers = ImmutableSet.copyOf(checkNotNull(columnMappers, "columnMappers is null"));
063        this.qualifiedColumnMappers = checkNotNull(qualifiedColumnMappers, "qualifiedColumnMappers is null");
064        this.customizers = ImmutableSet.copyOf(checkNotNull(customizers, "customizers is null"));
065        this.arrayTypes = checkNotNull(arrayTypes, "arrayTypes is null");
066        this.plugins = ImmutableSet.copyOf(checkNotNull(plugins, "plugins is null"));
067        this.codecFactory = new TypeResolvingCodecFactory(checkNotNull(codecs, "codecs is null"));
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
072    public void customize(Jdbi jdbi) {
073        rowMappers.forEach(jdbi::registerRowMapper);
074        qualifiedRowMappers.forEach(jdbi::registerRowMapper);
075
076        columnMappers.forEach(jdbi::registerColumnMapper);
077        qualifiedColumnMappers.forEach((k, v) -> jdbi.registerColumnMapper((QualifiedType) k, (ColumnMapper) v));
078
079        jdbi.registerColumnMapper(codecFactory);
080        jdbi.registerArgument(codecFactory);
081
082        plugins.forEach(jdbi::installPlugin);
083
084        arrayTypes.forEach(jdbi::registerArrayType);
085        customizers.forEach(c -> c.customize(jdbi));
086    }
087}
